title: Lambert Park Entertainer's Terrace
summary: Multi-tiered 1,800 sq ft terrace with 18-person linear kitchen, sunken OLED lounge, and kinetic water sculpture. Coastal sage scrub screening frames mountain views while blocking street sightlines.
outcome: 12-week modular construction. Hosts bi-monthly corporate events. California Home + Design feature. 24% resale premium documented.
